name: Quanect
description: The game has two realities, and in order to pass the level, you must move between them. Reality is not identical, objects and their position in different variations of the same room is different. You have to find a way out using these differences.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
